text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 1999. ==Events== *13 March - Vanessa Chinitor is selected to represent Belgium at the 1999 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Like the Wind". She is selected to be the forty-second Belgian Eurovision entry during Eurosong held at the VRT Studios in Schelle. ==Debuts== *30 August - Wizzy & Woppy (1999-2007) ==Television shows== ===1980s=== *VTM Soundmixshow (1989-1995, 1997-) ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) *Wittekerke (1993-2008) *Thuis (1995–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths==
title: 1999 in Belgian television
